messages.subject: Season's Greetings
messages.msgSnippet: Update on our oldest daughter s adventures in Toronto -- Nike is thrilled with the coursework at the Academy (www.academyofrealistart.com) and the big city
messages.messageBody:
Update on our oldest daughter's adventures in Toronto -- Nike is
thrilled with the coursework at the Academy
(www.academyofrealistart.com) and the big city life. Our Southern
girl is really warming up to winter in the Great White North, too
(though she'll only be dreaming of a White Christmas once she returns
for a visit to the land o' sunshine, where the orange and palm trees
sway, just like in LA...) We really appreciate all the advice and
encouragement that came from so many corners of our world while we
were preparing for the big move last summer -- we couldn't be more
pleased with her decision :)

God Bless Us, Every One ~

Penne & the Crew
Supporting America's Second Harvest Hurricane Relief Fund
http://kitchencrew.ardfamilyco-op.net
